website_summaries.verdict: A premium collapsible cart that delivers a terrific blend of versatility and capability.
pros: Includes an oversized wheel that enables you to effortlessly push the cart across rugged terrain
Cushioned handle helps reduce stress on the joints
Provides eight compartments, enabling you to store a wide range of items
Consists of weatherproof material that ensures the cart will maintain its appearance for an extended period of time
cons: Fabric tends to wear down and tear apart quickly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dolly
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, lightweight and easy to use. I have limited mobility and failing musculature so trying to do simple things like bring the groceries in from the car can be overwhelmingly painful and exhausting. After much searching I chose the Bigger Trolly Dolly and is has been perfect. I added a few hooks and some bungie cords for toting awkward items, and it has been stellar. Very pleased and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sib

customer_reviews.title: How did I manage before I bought this!!??
customer_reviews.text: Best investment!!...i moved into an apartment on the first floor....i can unload my groceries into my Trolley Dolly and roll right in...it holds a lot!!!...In the picture i actually have a whole watermelon and 2-6 packs of water among other things!!!!It's very sturdy and very well made!!..I sent one to my daughter...who loves it also!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's everything I wanted. Easy to use. Carries very heavy duffel bags like 60 lbs or more. High enough that stuff is protected from pavement dirt. Doesn't make noise. The handle part folds, but there is a lock that holds it rigid. I have had similar products where the handle would snap, and I'd have to fix it, or else pull it at a very low angle to the ground. But this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic junk. I have one of these I bought a few years ago and it's held up very well, but this second one is a disappointment. The bottom frame of this one broke within a few weeks of using it (reasonably, not loaded with excess weight). Now the frame sits flush against the wheel when any weight is on it, making it difficult to pull and maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: CmCinMD

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use. She has a child in a wheelchair that is loaded from the back of her van. After she is loaded then you put your packages behind her. You have to take the packages out to unload the wheelchair. I bought this so she could put her packages in the cart to roll out all at one time. It was perfect for the first use. The second time it was used the plastic part next to the wheel broke. The bag is very sturdy but it can’t be used now. I am very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended. Poor quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cart on May 16th and have recently noticed that the bottom of the bag that sits on the platform has developed holes and rips in the material. My uses for this cart are for laundry and grocery shopping only. I ordered the Paisley Navy color. The bottom of the bag is not reinforced. Really disappointed in the quality of this bag. I'll try and follow up with Amazon or DbBest. Will follow with am there reveiw.
customer_reviews.author: sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Have had two of them bite the dust with only light use.
customer_reviews.text: I thought spending $50 on a cart would ensure it was durable, but ohhhhh was I wrong! I used a cheap IKEA one for years without issues, yet I've gone through two of these rapidly with very little use. One I'm pretty sure was broken out of the box (or veeeerry shortly into my first walk to the grocery store). The other I used maybe 3 times before a random piece of plastic snapped. I'm super frustrated. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I had anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I had anticipated. It folds very nicely too. I am an adult teacher at Senior Centers and need to carry items in for each class from my car. I am very pleased with the trolley!
customer_reviews.author: Water Whiz

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart within a few weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart within a few weeks of use. When it was new, it stunk badly of chemicals, but after washing and airing out, it was alright. It worked good for a few weeks to haul our produce from the Farmers Market, but, then it fell apart. The plastic frame broke away from the metal legs. Cheap made in China quality, not made to hold up and soaked in chemicals. It's quite a shame, it worked well while I was able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Bag tore within 2 weeks, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this. It seemed of good quality. The folly part is, I have loved that part, however the bad portion tore within two weeks of use! I travel between elementary schools every few days (not even daily use) and it couldn’t even make it two weeks before tearing. VERY disappointed. I have tried other tapes of crates (the box kind) which also couldn’t keep up. My plan is to keep the trolly and use a durable Vera Bradley or some other bad with the folly. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amr07g

customer_reviews.title: Stinky fabric
customer_reviews.text: This items fabric smells horribly and I can’t tolerate the smell coming from the fabric it was constructed with. I tried to remedy this odor by washing it with Gain, and rinsing with Downey, the smell still exists. It’s unfortunate to because it’s large enough for my daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this (once I figured out how to secure the bag to the dolly)!!!
customer_reviews.text: So much room!!! I’m attaching 3 pictures showing where this bag attaches to on the dolly (it attaches in 3 places, so it should not slip off). I hope this helps. 1. The bag’s back pocket area has a big open space that is meant to slip over the back of the dolly. 2. The black strap on the back of the bag goes over the hand of the dolly as well. 3. The top flap at the top of the bag attaches to itself with the Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Serious moving machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who lives in an apartment. This is a serious must have for apartment dwellers (with elevators). You can haul cases of water, soda, etc and you can fill the bag with a weeks worth of groceries. Folds for easy storage and light weight. Wheel s are plastic but big and look like good support however this will not be used for urban dwelling. It is for getting stuff to/from the store, the car the apartment. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Granny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wheels and handle height help with durability of load success
customer_reviews.text: I walk about 1/2 mile to the grocery store and this foldable grocery cart effectively moves along the uneven sidewalk empty of groceries as well as full of groceries. (I have had grocery carts wheels fall off due to the weight of the grocery load.) I did not tightly fold this shopping cart to settle into the stores food cart, this shopping cart was manageable. I initially thought this shopping cart was too large with its handle height, trolly shelf and sturdy wheels. This grocery cart is working out.
customer_reviews.author: Sharrion Jones

customer_reviews.title: Tips over easily
customer_reviews.text: I've had the original Trolley Dolley for several years now and was very excited when the bigger version came out. I don't usually use it with the bag. I've attached a collapsible crate to the bottom to be able to carry wider things like a case of water. I have found that if it's bottom heavy, there's a good chance of it tipping over. That's happened several times already. No matter how careful I am, if I make the slightest turn or am not super careful going up and down stairs with it, it's going to tip over. It would be perfect if the whole thing were a few inches wider. That said, it's still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome yet isn’t... think twice
customer_reviews.text: After owning this product for less than three months it is shot. I am a teacher who attempted to use the bag to bring papers and my laptop to school. Because I have a bad back I hoped the bag would help me up a flight of stairs. Well, that was a complete joke. I will be tossing the bag as I have no use for a bag with twisted wheels that barely rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F. Harris Lacasale

customer_reviews.title: Solves the problem
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of the cart. It enables me to walk to the shopping mall and get necessary items at Walgreen's or the grocery store or to take packages to the post office. I am glad to have it.. It is not too heavy to pull back home. I like that the packages can be covered in case of rain or snow. It is not easy to fold up all the way for me, but would be for others, I'd guess. It is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley R. Enright

customer_reviews.title: Struts(?) broke
customer_reviews.text: Stretch just broke, and I've used this for barely a month. Otherwise it's great
customer_reviews.author: frankly62

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bag was not secured to trolley and developed holes upon 1st used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item to transport groceries from the store to my apartment. The bag is heavy duty and quite large. It provides more than enough space for my needs. The trolley is sturdy and the base stable. The only potential weak point I see is that the wheels are hard plastic and not rubberized. So far this has not been a problem. Once the bag is installed, it's not particularly easy to fold but that's not an issue for me as I can easily store it standing up or just remove the bag. Assembly is a snap and requires no tools. Overall this item works perfectly for my purposes and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Darth_J_Schmader

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger then the regular sized one
customer_reviews.text: Bought the regular sized one and returned it. It was way to small, only two bags of grocery if stuffed in. If your a hauler and over pack buy this bigger one it’s worth the $20 more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: With Covid and having to haul groceries from Trader Joe's, this buggy is the best. It holds a lot of food and the big wheels ride smoothly and if you have to ride the bus, they make it easy to host it up. Oh, and did I mention I'm a senior. I am often asked where did I purchase it. I live in a senior building and 3 of us have all purchased one from Amazon. It's worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Ponscella L. Cousins

customer_reviews.title: Shopping made EASY!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to point out, shipping is fast! I ordered this 2 days ago and here it is! I bought this because, even though I have a lot of reusable bags, they get heavy every now and then. I got this idea from a friend and she said it makes shopping more convenient. I can even take this to the mall and put all my purchases there. Without my bags hurting my arms lol I highly recommend! Pros: Lots of space Easy to assemble Has a spot for my umbrella ☔️ Can hold a gallon of water Cons: The price. Bit expensive but if it doesn’t hold out, I guarantee I’ll be getting my money back and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Adragna

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The car part of the bag is great. The velcro on the bag was sewn inconsistent. In other words one part of Velcro with sewn horizontally and the other side vertically. There's really no way to fasten the bag closed. The handle on the back of the bag broke first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Fuba

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with it. I have ordered foldup wagons, foldup wheelbarrows, and this is by far the best for my needs. Big enough to hold a lot of groceries, or a 24 pack of water bottles, or even my dressage saddle! Basically nothing to assemble other than the wheels which click nicely into place. Stands up nicely by itself or folds up and easily fits into the back of my Kia. Solid material and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the base would be bigger and the overall body material was not what I expected. Felt too light, in my opinion, to hold the cases of water and beverage box in the advertisement. However, after the easy assembly and testing with a case of water, it was perfect. I loved the stylish and sturdy multi zippered and pockets around and with the grocery bag; which easily connects to the Dolley. Folds up easily. Best purchase I have made to help me take things up and down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Torres

customer_reviews.title: Just works well, looks nice, needs more straps
customer_reviews.text: Great cart, got this for my boyfriend as he lives in a 4th floor co-op. Going in he has a lot is steps, the wide wheels make it easier. Another strap would help as the black holder moves around. Otherwise very handy. **Update: this was purchased about a month ago, we noticed a hole in the bottom yesterday, very disappointed. Trying to find out if there’s a warranty. He does not overload this bag at all, but it needs better design to stay put, perhaps more straps.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Mine is holding up well.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried from the mixed reviews but the one I received is holding up nicely. I love the size and the houndstooth pattern. It is pretty big, will hold a big day's shopping but still maneuvers well loaded. I wish it folded a little more flat but it gets small enough to leave in the car for when I need it. I'm quite happy with this shopping cart.
customer_reviews.author: RobynB

customer_reviews.title: Unessarsery bulk bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is made poorly and it's bulky, the wheels are squeeky already. Didn't sent it back because of the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for my uncle.
customer_reviews.text: The Bigger Trolley Dolly was given to my uncle who lives on the third floor in an apartment building as a gift. He absolutely loves it. It makes it much easier to take stuff up and down the stairs without straining or losing his balance and that is essential for a 90 year old man with an artificial hip. Combining this with the Keeper Adjustable Flat Bungee Cords makes it so much easier for him to move things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quilters- a Featherweight fits in here
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take my machine and supplies to sewing events (yes, quilters get together to sew) and it is perfect. it fits a popular machine, called a Featherweight in a case! The wheels take a moment- they have to be just right- but it's not difficult. they just have to be lined up correctly It's super handy. I keep mine packed, but it does fold down nicely when its empty. Thinking of getting a second one for other things, such as unloading groceries, or picnics, or shopping, or art class....so glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lake

customer_reviews.title: Ok bag, needs some improvements.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use as a laundry bag and it does it’s job. Folds easily. Roomy. But there’s two things I don’t like about it. The bag does not like to stay attached to the frame - the Velcro doesn’t hold when the bag is packed. It’s held on via a sleeve, as well as the Velcro, so it stays on, it just hangs off to the side weirdly. The second thing is that it needs straps to carry down stairs. It’s awkward to carry down stairs with just the handle.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and very happy I got it!
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved into an apartment, grocery day more than a little difficult. This item really does the trick! Even buying a cart full of items, this trolley generally allows me to get it all in one trip. I got some bungees too just in case to help band several bags together should it be necessary. The cart was ccx easy to assemble but a wheel fell off on first use. Just had to reaffix properly. Still havent figured how to fully collapse it, but sure I'll eventually stumble on whatever I'm missing to unlock it. Very easy to maneuver and store. I just have to remember to put it back in the car when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: stacey anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Strong, fictional, Light, Easy to Fold. Picked this up for my wife. We live on the 4th Floor of our condo and bringing things in from the garage under the building and through security doors can be a pain. So is having to make multiple trips. This cart eliminates all hassle. Can stack cases of soda on the sturdy base and load everything in the bag above and secures the load for easy maneuvering. Folds flat in the back of the car when not in use. Good Item
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Large, lightweight, sturdy carry-all.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought! Fits a lot of grocery bags, and plan on using it for beack packing too. PLEASE look at the instructions on how to assemble, I’ve read many reviews for the smaller version too where people complain that the bag stays loose or is not securely fastened. There are 2 places you need to slip the bag over the handle- bottom back off bag and top back. If you place it correctly it will stay very securely put!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable, well made
customer_reviews.text: Best cart ever. Love every moment I have used it. Will repurchase for a gift or for myself. Great for a person who cannot lift groceries. It really can hold 250 pounds!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary pena

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice and big; it is easy to fold down and put away; but it came with a STRONG industrial odor that didn't fade for about a month, and if you hit a big bump, the bag shuffles off to the side of the base of the trolley and you have to stop and put it back in the center or it tips over.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Live Up to Product Description
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in November 2019 and I have used it 4-5 times. I have never put more than 60lbs on it and it is supposed to be able to hold 200 lbs. The fold-down tray is broken now at the hinge on one side so it crushes the tire and is now totally useless. And of course, my return window is now closed. I am not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Joni Ailey

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof,  roomy & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used this yesterday to walk in the rain a few blocks from my RV to home. I had it filled to the top. The wheels handled stairs, curbs & sidewalk grates perfectly. It was easy to maneuver with the large wheels. Everything stayed dry inside. Make sure to secure all 3 "straps" as shown in the description pics, and the cargo bag stays put. I'm going to get a lot of use from this trolley!
customer_reviews.author: kdm

customer_reviews.title: VERY USEFUL
customer_reviews.text: I like that it makes life so much easier. I carry my groceries from my car to my apartment. I also use it when I go to the library with my daughter. I also like to use it when I go to the local flee market. This is very useful especially for a person with back problems like myself.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: One of the best buys ever
customer_reviews.text: This cart is absolutely essential if you can't carry heavy things. I use it as a suitcase, grocery cart, taking the laundry down to the laundry room, and just today, I used the dolly to bring my packages to the Post Office. My sister has 12 cement stairs leading to her apartment. This cart goes up and down those stairs perfectly fine. This cart has saved my back. It's well-made, durable and waterproof. Everyone who sees it wants to know where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The frame seems to be fine. Very disappointed in the lack of quality control
customer_reviews.text: There is a fabric flaw running down the side of the bag's top flap. It is very obvious and should not have been shipped out. This cannot be given as a gift. The frame seems to be fine. Very disappointed in the lack of quality control, especially with online purchases. This bag needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: gardener

customer_reviews.title: Enables me to shop stores/library from home. Cannot drive/legally blind
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to take shopping. waterproof, Strong. But sometimes slips off to side, unbalancing it. Tried using bungie cord but unsuccesful.... addendum on June 4th, 2019: I find now that if the weight in the bag is balanced, side to side, it does not slip off the dolly as I walk.... just a hint to the wise!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth OFS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cart, but not big enough for groceries or laundry
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with the purchase of this shopping cart! It looks beautiful. It is beautiful. Exactly like pictured. However, there is very little room for groceries or laundry. I thought it would be bigger in terms of the bag. It doesn't fold as easily as they claim. It tips back when taking out items from the bag. The bag won't stay open when loading. Things I like: the wheels and hardware are sturdy, it is very lightweight, it has lots of compartments for extra necessities...it is beautiful, got a compliment about it. And, I LOVE the fact that it converts to a dolly. That, by far is my favorite feature. Has saved my back a few times!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Good for School Teacher
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cart for a school teacher because the frame is metal (durable) and not cheap plastic like other carts. The wheels feel like foam, but I don't know what material it's made of. Only time and daily usage will dictate if the wheels will last from being rolled on hot, Texas concrete and asphalt from the parking lot to the building.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Wanted in a Rain Resistant Shopping Cart
customer_reviews.text: This does everything I wanted in a rain resistant shopping cart. The only downsides are that the bag sits freely on the cart platform, allowing it to slip sideways if tilted - as in going around a sharp corner, and the other is that it is a bit unwieldy when loading and unloading into my car. If that is not a problem for you, go for it! I take this grocery shopping, to the farmers market, and to work. It holds my lunch cooler, my shoulder bag, raincoat, work stuff and still leaves room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Those plastic black braces,maybe they should be metal,or maybe mines was a defect
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the 3rd time, with about 50 lbs in it and the 2 small black plastic brace under the bag that connects to the medal spokes Brokeeeeee, and i would like another one, or my money back, i paid to much money to take a loss
customer_reviews.author: JUDY NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: I use this to deliver groceries since my profession was pretty much eliminated due to COVID. Has been really helpful with deliveries upstairs, although the weight needs to be distributed evenly otherwise it feels like the frame flexed a little.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: It's so sturdy. I've been able to get stuff at the store (e.g. bags of potatoes, big packages of meat) that would have been nearly impossible to carry in my normal cloth shoulder bag. I get asked where I got it every time I've gone to the grocery store. It handles 50-60 pounds like it's nothing. 2 months later: This thing is a champ. A watermelon and a weeks worth of groceries today, no problema! Update: A year in, and it still is the best $50.00 ever spent. With Covid19 shutting down the bus lines near me, trips to the store range from 2-10 miles. walking. It handles them better than I do.
customer_reviews.author: stu h.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely grocery trolley
customer_reviews.text: I just love these trolleys, bought two having owned a couple before. Well made and lite , easy to fold and they can carry a lot of groceries. We get looked at with envy everywhere we go with them.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This is a HUGE blessing!!
customer_reviews.text: I am able to tote all my groceries up stairs in one trip!!! Perfect for shuffling records from one facility to another at work. I am looking forward to vacationing. I can carry the bag with the dolly inside with ease of leaving the ship/plane/vehicle. Then as I shop I can take the bag off my shoulder and put on the Dollie. Perfect to take to the pool or beach with all the supplies.
customer_reviews.author: oma

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and good for heavy loads-
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy and light to carry by hand in the folded configuration on the way to the store, and super easy to open-up to it's working configuration when it' time to load it up and walk home again. Now instead of only being able to carry a couple of gallons of drinking water in my backpack at a time, I can load-up a month's worth and and be done with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made! The craftsmanship needs to be improved!
customer_reviews.text: It’s made very flimsy. The seems on mine started to come apart after 4 uses of it being completely filled. Sent it back. It has the potential to be a great product if they invested a few more cents in them to make them with stronger fabric and stronger stitching. FYI-The ones Ikea makes are way stronger! Only thing is that it’s smaller and doesn’t have the 3 wheels to climb steps. But that one I’ve had for years and it’s holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great cart
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest cart I've owned. I hope it lasts much longer than all the others, too! I do see how the canvas bag could become a problem because it's not secured on the bottom. The bag could slip off to the side. I like that the bottom stays up when I want the cart flat, but it isn't real handy to bring down the bottom and put it back up. Just a bit of effort and not super efficient, but the cart as a whole is very functional. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: no1234

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Update: it's now 2 years later and i used the bag daily. The cart I found not useful as it was hard to maneuver and not tip over. The strap just ripped off the bag last week. But I got weekly use out of it for 2 years and I jammed every bit of my laundry in it. Used this a few times now and it fits a lot of laundry in it and I carried my 40lb bag of cat litter up the stairs with it. The wheels are not the greatest on carpet up stairs but it does what it needs and it’s cute . Size and height are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: From my experience
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I purchased this trolley, took it out of the box and about to assemble the product and noticed that the hinge for the base the part that folds next to the wheel was broken. I sent it back. Because I liked this trolley dolly I decided to reorder, in hopes that I get a better one. apart from paying more for the trolley on the 2nd one than the first I had to wait longer for delivery. When I received the 2nd one same thing, opened the box took it out and it was broken same area, sent it back. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Wwjd

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: After attending a large flea market with my daughter and lugging heavy items all day I bought her this as a gift. She loves it. Very light weight, folds easily to fit in the trunk and it is easy to roll around. She also liked the fact that parking it outside the tents at events allowed others to quickly see where she was shopping to keep track of her. This would also be great for groceries for those who walk.
customer_reviews.author: ScSpec

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for a Teacher
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and had to return because it fell apart after a couple of weeks. The company was really easy to work with and sent me another. This one has been much better. I’m a teacher and since I have so much to carry daily I needed something that would save my back. A teacher friend of mine ordered a smaller one and loves hers as well. It’s really been a lifesaver. The only part that was tricky at first was getting it in and out of my car. I didn’t want the dirty wheels to mess up my seats.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ann Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Good Size & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just right to haul my art supplies to class. It is large, a lovely color, has extra pocket for small items. I don’t know whether it is easy to fold because I leave most of my supplies in it all the time. I would prefer larger wheels because I have to pull it up several steps to my house, but it works fine as is.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie50

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and love the unique yellow color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the bright yellow. The dolly cart looks durable and of better quality compare to others that I have seen. The bag is spacious. The only thing I disliked but not a big deal, is that I wish that the back handle would attach when folding to avoid an unexpected unfold. Otherwise, I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Broke on my first trip to the grocery store. Product description says it can carry 150 lbs (picture says up to 200 lbs) but I never loaded it over 40 and the stand broke irreparably
customer_reviews.author: Christian Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: The Bigger the Better
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Bigger Trolley Dolly. It’s big and sturdy and when I lost a wheel I could replace it easily. My only problem was I ordered two of the Bigger and got one bigger and one original and the original isn’t much good. It’s too small for me. I tried to report the issue and got a $5 refund *insert eyeroll* I guess I can use that one to buy kitty litter...
customer_reviews.author: unomesowell@yahoo.com

customer_reviews.title: A Wonderful Help!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 83. My garage is separate from my house, and it's fine gravel, not tarmac in between. This trolley-dolly makes it easy for me to haul my weekly purchases from trunk of car, up the ramp to my back door, and into the kitchen or pantry all by myself. What a help!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Y. Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Achilles' wheel
customer_reviews.text: The lock of one of the wheels did not work in the first one I bought. Returned the item, asked for a replacement, received. Replacement item had somewhat hard but apparently functional locks. Took cart (empty) for a test-drive in the street (dry, flat surface) and in 2 minutes one of the wheels unclasped. The lock was quite loosened. Returned the cart (again) and now I am asking for a refund. Could be a very good product (good size, lots of pockets) if not by this garbage assembling of wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Breno E.

customer_reviews.title: Holds about 4 packed grocery bags' worth
customer_reviews.text: Holds about 4 packed grocery bags' worth -- pack the heavy stuff at the bottom, then the frozen stuff, and everything else on top from heaviest to lightest. Super light to roll even when fully packed. Wheels are nice and I liked the fabric choices -- something with a cute print for me, but in "manly" colors for the hubs.
customer_reviews.author: Mosie Osie

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Must connect it properly though
customer_reviews.text: This cart is amazing. Hold up to 150lbs. Great to get around. I’ve realized a lot of customers did not put the trolly together properly and that’s most likely the reason their having issues. Meaning you must connect the bag over the bars in order for it to hold in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect generator dolly
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it for his generator! The bag mounts on the back well to hold extension cords and other generator accessories. Sturdy enough to support this compact but weighty item. A couple more bungey cords should secure it nicely to the platform. Excellent price, portability and functionality for this purpose. The wheels are also appropriate for the load in width and density. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: E. Garate

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Plastic part that holds the back in place is trash breaks easy or can come defective. Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.author: the truth

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: If you were looking for something to lug your groceries home in, this is the product. If you were looking for a lightweight dolly to assist with moving and bulky items/boxes this is it. You need to pay attention to the weight limit however, which is only 150 pounds. It was a perfect assistant during my move. This now makes two in our family.
customer_reviews.author: HudsonSonic2

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: this is wonderful with a little adaptation, i read on someones review that the bottom of the bag slips around when weighted so bout some bungees with carabiner hooks (sold on amazon) & they keep it in place just great. awesome if you like walking places but don't like carrying loads this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL DREAMS

customer_reviews.title: awesome cart!
customer_reviews.text: This little cart has saved me so much lifting and carrying of heavy or numerous items. I used it nonstop when I was recently moving!! Still using it constantly in bring in groceries or other things from my vehicle. Definitely a five star rating from me!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Burks

customer_reviews.title: The Rolling Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a little flimsy for the price. I found this exact item at Target for half the price. I used this to load some of my scrapbook papers and items to attend a scrapbooking retreat. The convenience was in being able to roll it.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great help to me!
customer_reviews.text: I am an older woman living alone and I recently moved and had to get a bottled water service. Moving those bottles was close to impossible for me. Trying to find a solution, I came across this trolley. I haven't even used it with the bag yet, but that will be great for the beach, etc. The wheels are very good at going up the ledge from the garage to the house, so I can see that it would be good on stairs. I also use it for bringing heavy groceries in (boxes of canned seltzer, kitty litter, etc. Such a huge help in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I walk more now and this nice dolly with a beautiful storage pack is ideal. People are already asking me where I got it and I only had it out for 1 day! Be ready to start selling more because I am advertising it for Free! Love my Trolley Dolly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed. I'm going to contact them and ask ...
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke on the top part over the weekend. Pretty disappointed. I'm going to contact them and ask for a new outer shell.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cart to help with carrying groceries and other items from my car to my 8th floor loft. I have bought two others-the first was too big (long) and wouldn’t fit in my SMART car. Number two was too small and couldn’t carry much. This is number three and it’s JUST RIGHT! Easy to assemble, light weight and collapses like a dream. Thank you for such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cart for 3 months and used it about 2x per month to pick up groceries. The flap that goes over the thin bar and attached with velcro has come apart. This flap is what holds the entire sack upright. Without it the bag will sag and fall off the base.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds height expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9 & struggle with handles not being long enough & this is PERFECT! Will update on use & durability after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This size is heavy
customer_reviews.text: The cart is heavy by itself without putting anything in it. There are too many unnecessary zipper compartments. When I put my groceries in it is hard for me to pull. I probably should have gotten the smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: bebo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and assemble. I leave mine in my trunk and use it whenever I have allot to move from my car to my apartment. Its very light and would recommend to anyone who like in my case dont like to make multiple trips to unload from the car.
customer_reviews.author: Le Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Just great!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag, big enough, lots of pockets, very sturdy. We use it to bring all our Summer time stuff to the park: tennis equipment, soccer ball, water guns, buckets, towels, books, etc. Lots of room for all the lotions, bottles, first aid kit, wipes... very happy with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Gina S.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Hard Job a Breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this cart mainly to transport full 5 gallon water jugs from my car to the kitchen. That is quite a distance in my house, and it mades the chore so simple to do. The big water jug sits firmly in place without any additional straps for security.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: What a Waste of Money! Bag Does Not Fit on the Frame!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cart to take with us, as we were moving to Mexico without a car. I researched the wheels, the size of the bag and the maneuverability. The canvas bag seemed to be the wrong bag for this cart. There were no sleeves to insert the frame into, as was directed in the instructions. There were parts included that had no relation to the bag. We did not open the box until we got to Mexico, so we were not aware of the problem until we tried to use it. Now we awkwardly bungi cord the contraption, which doesn't really work. We are sorry we purchased this cart!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen W.

customer_reviews.title: Handy cart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart 2 months ago. It's handy for me to haul groceries from my parking spot, up stairs and to my apartment. No more repeated trips back and forth. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the platform the canvas tote sits on is a light weight plastic. Still works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy - carries tons
customer_reviews.text: I love this for when having to walk to the grocery store and back! Carries lots of weight and also has wide wheels so cracks in the pavement don't send it off course!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This so easy to use, works great, and allows me to bring my groceries into the house from the car! It maneuvers very easily! Light weight so it doesn't add to the weight I am trying to move! Great product! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving groceries.
customer_reviews.text: It is great for my needs. I use it to bring groceries from my car into the house. The base will fit 6 two liter bottles of pop. Then I can load the lighter stuff on top. I just wish it had something like a tie back on the top flap to hold it to the handle when you are putting things in & taking them out. I am going to add something myself because the flap is a little stiff & can get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost immediately with far less than 150 pounds of weight
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag that goes with it. However, the dolly design has a flaw. It broke the first time it was used because of the location of the rivets. I'm returning it for a full refund and not ordering another until I know there are no manufacturer flaws in it. If I hadn't had a bunch of bungee cords with me, I'd have never got my groceries home. Had to strap the base together to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble and fold down
customer_reviews.text: Just received my trolly dolly yesterday and It couldn’t be any easier to assemble. Took me 1 min to pop the wheels on this bad boy and put it together. So far this item is the coolest thing I ordered off of amazon and I can’t wait to get so much use out of it. I’m even considering getting my mom one as well!!
customer_reviews.author: byrdie

customer_reviews.title: The bags do not last a month.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart. The bags are awful. The grommets and inside ripped after 1 month. I’m going to search for another bag, but I wish they would do something about the lack of sturdiness of the bag. This is my 3rd cart and same thing happens every time. Replacement bags are not available or too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: christopher leary

customer_reviews.title: Bigger Trolley Dolly
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my Bigger Trolley Dolly. I fits in the back of my Jeep or pickup. I put the dolly in fully packed. I lift it up and in it goes. I have my dolly packed for games that I attend for watch my grandson. I pack 2 blankets, a large jacket & rain jacket, snacks, water, umbrella and my stadium seat I hook over the handle. The large wheels do a great job. The bungy cord helps hold the bag to the trolley. I like it and it works great!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Green

customer_reviews.title: Makes things so much easier
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for and I love it! It was on sale, so I wasn't sure about the quality at first, but it's great! I've used it plenty, packed to the brim and it's going strong. Would love to be able to clip it closed after folding, but a bungee cord works too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL item. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this constantly. Love it. Make sure you follow the directions for the wheels and you’ll have no problems. I haven’t needed to strap the bottom down, but I can see how it could shift around on some people. I carry bungee cords in the zip compartment just in case I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Caren McElrea

customer_reviews.title: The bag not usable due to smell.
customer_reviews.text: The trolley part is frest but the bag that came with it has a strong odor that wont wash out. I can't use because I don't want my things smelling like the bag. Very disappointing not being able to use product fully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the plastic teacher cart!
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the plastic teacher carts! It is sturdy and the wheels are designed in a manner that allows you to take a heavy load up stairs. There are multiple pockets and the fabric/stitching does not show any sign of wear and tear after plenty of trips carting books, papers, and supplies to and from the classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great.... except for the bag
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to carry my things to my classroom instead of shouldering 3 bags each morning. Finally found this ideal trolley which I fell in love with. Perfect for toting my school papers, lunch bag, and purse. But then I fell out of love when I discovered that after less than a month of using the bag is ripping. There is a large separation where a side seam is and then 2 identical slits at the back on both sides. I am not using it for heavy carrying or putting large amounts of items inside so there should be no reason for this to happen in this time frame. So disappointed in the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but bag does not attach.
customer_reviews.text: No directions for attaching bag to trolly. How to do this is not apparent. If there were a way to attach bag, this cart would be terrific especially since it is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Dolley sturdy but bag could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: The dolley part itself is very sturdy. However I got this in July and already the bag has ripped. I wish the bag was more wider and more durable. I had a bag from the $.99 store half the price, more durable bag that lasted 5 years before one of the wheels gave in. This one is ok but wish for a more wider and durable bag. Since it can come off I will look for a replacement bag.
customer_reviews.author: cathy mack

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed bag
customer_reviews.text: This could be the best cart because the wheels are great however the bag is poorly made. I bought it to primarily carry 3 pair of ice skates and a couple water bottles to walk 3 blocks. After using it 5 times the strap that connects the bag started fraying and the stitching where the bag Velcro's onto the top bar starting coming undone. Lastly, the Velcro attachment to the cart is just not strong enough. It just pulls off if you put anything heavier than 10-15 lbs in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerman

customer_reviews.title: Great price larger trolley
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my grocery shopping. larger size than my previous trolley and it is supposed to have a heavier capacity. Only negative is that for some reason the bag lists to one side when full and it is evenly packed.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B. Varga

product_meta.title: dbest products Bigger Trolley Dolly, Grey Chevron Shopping Grocery Foldable Cart
product_meta.description: Color:Grey ChevronThe folding Bigger Trolley Dolly folds in 1/2 for compact storage. It has a comfort cushion handle that allows you to pull it anywhere. The folding Trolley dolly is designed with 7 compartments/pockets including a beverage holder. The oversized beefy wheels allow for smooth rolling on any surface including cobblestones, sand, stairs or any uneven surfaces. Carry everything from utilities, small groceries, and laundry with this lightweight wheeled push handcart.
feature_bullets: The Bigger Trolley Dolly is the picture-perfect foldable cart that balances lightweight capability with durability. Trolley Dolly folds in half for compact storage. Store it in the trunk of your car, under your bed, in your mudroom, and in the garage.

A distinct feature in the Bigger Trolley Dolly is the oversized heavy duty Beefy Wheel that can take on various terrains. It can roll up in the sand it can go upstairs. It takes on broken and high curbs and sidewalks with ease.
Multi-functional Uses: Use it as a shopping cart, grocery cart, utility cart and overall exceptional cart on wheels with little to no assembly required.60% bigger than the standard Trolley Dolly.

The weatherproof material keeps contents dry from the rain snow and the other forces of nature. This easy rolling cart is great in aiding seniors on their trips to the market due to the soft ergonomic cushion handle which reduces the stress on the joints.
Contains 8 compartments, which include a beverage holder. Remove the bag and it becomes a lightweight dolly capable of carrying 150 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,933 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
